mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bbs_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND target_id = 0 AND is_delete = 0
SELECT c.id, c.content, u.avatar, u.account, u.nickname, u.create_time FROM bbs_comment c, bbs_user u WHERE c.user_id = u.id AND c.target_id = 0 AND c.post_id = #{postId} AND c.is_delete = 0

SELECT c1.id, c1.content, c1.create_time, u1.nickname AS fromNickname, u1.account AS fromAccount, u2.nickname AS toNickname, u2.account AS toAccount FROM bbs_comment c1, bbs_comment c2, bbs_user u1, bbs_user u2 WHERE c1.comment_id = #{commentId} AND c1.target_id = c2.id AND c1.user_id = u1.id AND c2.user_id = u2.id AND c1.is_delete = 0 AND c2.is_delete = 0
